name: "Todo" App using PARSE as backend
body:
# Overview:
As mentioned in the parse web site: whenever you use Parse, (you can): **"...Focus on creating unique & engaging apps on any platform. We take care of everything else your app needs, from the core of your app to analytics and push notifications. ..."**

This app show the usage of the **PARSE** api-sdk to store data in the cloud, in a nonsql database.
Based on the tutorial "Todo" List in the parse web site. Allow creation of custom users.
The app can work either offline or online, data will be sync with the cloud when online.


## References:

   Parse web site: https://parse.com/

   Parse Todo tutorial: https://parse.com/tutorials/using-the-local-datastore

   Parse Android sdk guide: https://parse.com/docs/android_guide
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
